description: Try our easy to follow Chia Banana & Date Muffins recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Sweet muffin,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Baking,Banana,Halal,Soy free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Chia Banana & Date Muffins Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Line a 12hole medium muffin pan with paper cases. Combine flour, sugar and chia seeds in a bowl. Stir in the dates.
In another bowl, mash the bananas. Stir in eggs, butter and milk. Fold into the flour mixture until just combined.
Divide mixture among muffin holes and top each with banana slices. Bake for 20 minutes or until a skewer inserted into the centre comes out clean. Serve warm or at room temperature.
